A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This is a very good movie\, definitely a huge improvement from \"The Force Awakens\" (which was basically a copy of \"A New Hope.\" Definitely recommend it. It takes more a lot more risks and definitely has a plot of its own with multiple twists. There are a couple of things that happen that don't exactly make a lot of sense and annoying things in the plot both new and left over from \"The Force Awakens\,\" but overall a really good movie.\n\nDefinitely an overhated movie.
